visualizations.title: Rice Price Forecast for 2025
visualizations.description: Comprehensive forecast plot showing historical prices, test predictions, and 2025 forecasts with clear separation between periods.

visualizations.title: Actual vs Predicted Values (Test Set)
visualizations.description: Scatter plot comparing actual vs predicted prices for the test set with perfect prediction reference line.

visualizations.title: Residual Analysis
visualizations.description: Residual analysis showing residuals over time and their distribution across the test set.

insights: Model performance is extremely poor with MAPE of 79.22% and RÂ² of -inf
Forecast shows flat line at last observed value (Naive Last Value method)
Test set residuals show large deviations from actual values
data.summary: The Naive Last Value model is not suitable for forecasting rice prices in this case. The model's predictions show a 79% average error and fail to capture any meaningful pattern in the data. A more sophisticated forecasting approach is required to generate reliable price predictions for 2025.
data.task_answer: The Naive Last Value model is not suitable for forecasting rice prices in this case. The model's predictions show a 79% average error and fail to capture any meaningful pattern in the data. A more sophisticated forecasting approach is required to generate reliable price predictions for 2025.
